Privacy Policy

1. The content of the Privacy Protection Policy includes how the personal identification data collected during your utilization of our app will be processed. The Privacy Protection Policy does not apply to other relevant linked websites from our app; it does not apply to the management personnel that are not directly commissioned by or involved in the Website.

 

2. NCKU Library app collects and processes your personal data carefully, only for the specific purposes of this app and the scope of NCKU Library services.

 

3. NCKU Library app requires the your personal information including your student ID or staff ID and password of NCKU for access personalized service. Only the student ID or staff ID will be stored in this app.

 

4. In addition, NCKU Library app may collect certain information automatically including the type of mobile device you use, application token, OS version, visitor activities and login time for analytical purposes to help us further improve the application.                

 

5. National Cheng Kung University Library hereby ensures personal information provided through NCKU Library app conforms to the "Personal Information Protection Act" of Taiwan(R.O.C.). For detailed information about National Cheng Kung University Library\'s privacy policy and security, please visit:

https://app.lib.ncku.edu.tw/privacy.xhtml

Policy of Collection, Processing, and Utilization of Your Personal Data (hereinafter referred to as “Policy”)

The Scope of the Privacy Protection Policy

The content of the Policy includes how your personal data will be collected, processed, and used in NCKU Library app and in-app services. The Policy does not apply to other relevant linked websites from NCKU Library app; it does not apply to the management personnel that are not directly commissioned by or involved in the above-mentioned websites.

The Collection and Utilization of Data

1. NCKU Library app collects and processes your personal data carefully and abides by the necessity of data utilization in an appropriate way only for the specific purposes of promoting and providing NCKU Library mobile services to clients.

2. NCKU Library app requires your personal information including your student ID (or staff ID) and password of NCKU portal for accessing personalized service. Only your student ID (or staff ID) and name will be stored in this app.

3. In addition, NCKU Library app may collect certain information automatically including the type of mobile device you use, application token, OS version, visitor activities and login time for analytical purposes to help us further improve the application.

4. National Cheng Kung University Library hereby ensures personal information provided through NCKU Library app conforms to the “Personal Information Protection Act” of Taiwan (R.O.C.).

For detailed information about National Cheng Kung University Library\'s privacy policy and security, please visit:
https://app.lib.ncku.edu.tw/privacy.xhtml

NCKU Library app may request permission of device according to your needs.

1. NCKU Library app requests connection to Internet for online services and receiving notifications.

2. NCKU Library app requests to use camera to extract information from the ISBN bar-code of books.

3. NCKU Library app may ask permission to use notifications.
